response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering its quality and the unique opportunities it provides, I'm offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects the product's true worth while allowing us both to benefit. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our needs.", "product_price": 14000}
